category: General Assembly of Delegates and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 13 (Agenda and Description of Proposals)
contents: Article 13 (Agenda presentation and proposal explanation) ① When the agenda begins to be deliberated according to the agenda, the chairman must declare that the agenda will be submitted to the meeting in the order set forth in Article 6. ② When submitting an agenda item to a meeting, the chairperson must first have the moderator explain the purpose of the proposal.
